Definition: In this task, you're given a short article. Your job is to classify the article based on its category. Use the following classification labels, 0. World, 1. Sports, 2. Business, 3. Science or Technical. Label the text "0" if it contains information related to world. Label the text "1" if it contains information related to sports. Label the text "2" if it contains information related business. Label the text "3" if it contains science or technical related information.

Positive Examples.input: The Race is On: Second Private Team Sets Launch Date for Human Spaceflight (SPACE.com) SPACE.com - TORONTO, Canada -- A second team of rocketeers competing for the  #36;10 million Ansari X Prize, a contest for privately funded suborbital space flight, has officially announced the first launch date for its manned rocket.
Positive Examples.explanation: This statement indicates that it is related to space which is in fact related to science. This is a positive example because the label correctly classifies the statement as science.

Positive Examples.explanation: This statement indicates that it is related to the "Apparel retailers" and their fashion designs, which is related to business. This is a positive example because the label correctly classifies the statement as business.

Positive Examples.input: Goosen takes lead in the BMW Open Retief Goosen, a two-time US Open champion, grabbed the first-round lead in the BMW Open in Nord Eichenried, Germany, with a 6-under-par 66, while Colin Montgomerie improved his European Ryder Cup chances by finishing one stroke back on Thursday.
Positive Examples.explanation: This statement is related to the "BMW Open Retief Goosen" being "a two-time US Open champion" and its achievements in various places, which is related to sports. The statement also insicates about "Colin Montgomerie". This is a positive example because the label correctly classifies the statement as sports.

Negative Examples.input: Islamic group holding lorry drivers demands firm quit Iraq (AFP) AFP - A group calling itself the Secret Islamic Army (SIA) will release seven hostages it has been holding for more than a month as soon as their Kuwaiti company says it will no longer operate in Iraq, the SIA announced.
Negative Examples.explanation: This statement is related to "Islamic group" and their activities in "Iraq", which is related to world. This is a negative example because the label incorrectly classifies the statement as sports.

Negative Examples.input: Calif. Aims to Limit Farm-Related Smog (AP) AP - Southern California's smog-fighting agency went after emissions of the bovine variety Friday, adopting the nation's first rules to reduce air pollution from dairy cow manure.
Negative Examples.explanation: This statement is related to "Farm-Related Smog" and their activities in "Southern California", which is related to science. This is a negative example because the label incorrectly classifies the statement as world.

Negative Examples.input: Dollar Briefly Hits 4-Wk Low Vs Euro  LONDON (Reuters) - The dollar dipped to a four-week low  against the euro on Monday before rising slightly on  profit-taking, but steep oil prices and weak U.S. data  continued to fan worries about the health of the world's  largest economy.

I'm in favor of helping soldiers vote; this is a democracy, everyone should be able to vote. Yet I'm deeply skeptical of this proposal, for two reasons:  The plan depends on e-mailed ballots being printed out and faxed by the Defense Department but does not provide any safeguards against soldiers being sanctioned for how they have voted;  The transmission method is inherently technically insecure
